pooping everywhere😔😖😳😤😡😣

                                     SHREK
                         Once upon a time there was a lovely 
                         princess. But she had an enchantment 
                         upon her of a fearful sort which could 
                         only be broken by love's first kiss. 
                         She was locked away in a castle guarded 
                         by a terrible fire-breathing dragon. 
                         Many brave knights had attempted to 
                         free her from this dreadful prison, 
                         but non prevailed. She waited in the 
                         dragon's keep in the highest room of 
                         the tallest tower for her true love 
                         and true love's first kiss. (laughs) 
                         Like that's ever gonna happen. What 
                         a load of - (toilet flush)
 
               Allstar - by Smashmouth begins to play. Shrek goes about his 
               day. While in a nearby town, the villagers get together to go 
               after the ogre.
 
               NIGHT - NEAR SHREK'S HOME

                                     MAN1
                         Think it's in there?

                                     MAN2
                         All right. Let's get it!

                                     MAN1
                         Whoa. Hold on. Do you know what that 
                         thing can do to you?
 
                                     MAN3
                         Yeah, it'll grind your bones for it's 
                         bread.
 
               Shrek sneaks up behind them and laughs.

                                     SHREK
MAN1
                         Back! Back, beast! Back! I warn ya! 
                         (waves the torch at Shrek.)
 
               Shrek calmly licks his fingers and extinguishes the torch. The 
               men shrink back away from him. Shrek roars very loudly and long 
               and his breath extinguishes all the remaining torches until the 
               men are in the dark.
 
                                     SHREK
                         This is the part where you run away. 
                         (The men scramble to get away. He laughs.) 
                         And stay out! (looks down and picks 
                         up a piece of paper. Reads.) "Wanted. 
                         Fairy tale creatures."(He sighs and 
                         throws the paper over his shoulder.)
 
                         
               THE NEXT DAY

               There is a line of fairy tale creatures. The head of the guard 
               sits at a table paying people for bringing the fairy tale creatures 
               to him. There are cages all around. Some of the people in line 
               are Peter Pan, who is carrying Tinkerbell in a cage, Gipetto 
               who's carrying Pinocchio, and a farmer who is carrying the three 
               little pigs.
 
                                     GUARD
                         All right. This one's full. Take it 
                         away! Move it along. Come on! Get up!
 
                         
                                     HEAD GUARD
                         Next!

                                     GUARD
                         (taking the witch's broom) Give me that! 
                         Your flying days are over. (breaks the 
                         broom in half)
 
                                     HEAD GUARD
                         That's 20 pieces of silver for the witch. 
                         Next!
 
                                     GUARD
                         Get up! Come on!

                                     HEAD GUARD
                         Twenty pieces.

                                     LITTLE BEAR
                         (crying) This cage is too small.

                                     DONKEY
                         Please, don't turn me in. I'll never 
                         be stubborn again. I can change. Please! 
                         Give me another chance!
 
                                     OLD WOMAN
                         Oh, shut up. (jerks his rope)

attributes.review: i don’t understand why this app took so long to download, though it’s such a simple app 👁👄👁. i downloaded this app to support our 𝑛𝑜𝑛-𝑟𝑎𝑐𝑖𝑠𝑡🧚‍♀️, 𝑛𝑜𝑛-ℎ𝑜𝑚𝑜𝑝ℎ𝑜𝑏𝑖𝑐🏳️‍🌈, and 𝑎𝑛𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑎𝑟𝑐𝑖𝑠𝑠𝑖𝑠𝑖𝑐🙄president, but i didn’t get what i spent my time for😡🤬😡. i waited approximately 14 hours for this app to download 🥶and when it finished downloading and my mom checked my phone, she suddenly passed out😱! i do not recommend this app it killed my mother and if you don’t want your mother killed i highly advise you to not download this app 😌✌️and when my dad saw this app he turned into a cheeto with orange peel strings coming out of it! this app is also highly inappropriate and it asked me for my number as soon as i opened it. this is extremely inappropriate and i am still a minor and the president is in his 70’s, making this pedophilia. this is highly unacceptable and the motto is not correct, make america great again?! luv, you’re making america worse 🧚‍♀️😌, DO NOT RE-ELECT THIS BAFOON INTO OFFICE!!!

attributes.review: App took 37 weeks to download and even after I couldn’t use it it was just “trump 2020” over and over again to the tune of the O’reilly auto parts theme song and when i deleted it it wiped my phone and when I went into my living room and bunch of fat roches where in a circle chanting the same thing and then they ate all my bananas! Now I have a terrible smell in my basement, 8 rochas living with me, no bananas, and a wiped phone. -399/10 wound NOT recomend 😤😤😤
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😤

attributes.review: After waiting six months to download this app I was hoping to change my perspective on Mr.Cheeto, nothing really worked on the app for me it kept glitching out and taking me to a black market link to buy scorpions and roaches with little hats that say “ Make America great again! 🧢 “  Not gonna lie thought about buying them and naming them all Richard, but I didn’t. Since this app has done nothing but mess up and offer me black market deals I had no choice but delete it. Turns out once you download the app you have to keep it for another year before you can delete it. Since the day I got the app weird things have been happening to me. My phone is messing up now. My background is trumps nude picture. And let me tell you nothing to see there. It’s tiny. Not the point but my background is an American flag but with little trump heads and roaches (with the hats 🧢)scattered  across the flag. Makes me ill. I had no other choice to throw out the phone. Since then I swear I kept since naked trumps around my house. If it’s either a shadow or a literal figure I’m making eye contact with. Also I got roaches out of no where. Not even the worse part though, I also have krats. Yes krats a new species of rats but with Karen haircuts. I made it up but still they talk exactly like kids bop Karen and it’s scary now I have to move . I would definitely not recommended getting this app‼️
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP all the bad reviews are right!!

attributes.review: honestly can u even call this an app? I’m ashamed of anyone who enjoys it. It rooie 17 hours to download and I had 3 gigabytes to spare. The quality is so low that I would delete this app quickly. Have u no shame! I tried to get help with the situation but the workers would not listen! They shamed me for being of color and called me monkey. I could hear the “Ooo ooo ah ah” noises they made at me. Honestly broke my heart. They said that since I was Muslim they’d give me no service and that I need to “Allahu Akbar away from this country”! I’m so ashamed of u guys! Why on earth does this racist app exist? Please rethink this app and delete it from this App Store. I am baffled that u would think it deserves to be here. After being discriminated against horribly I don’t know what I could do next. They told me multiple times to go shove bananas down my throat. I am a young woman do I deserve this behavior? I think the f*ck not ❤️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE ❤️

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
